title: The Therapist
description: Sometimes planning a wedding can be hell.When Finn Mackay, a Psychotherapist, is shot dead when delivering his wedding vows, DCI William Scott and his team are called in to investigate. Soon they discover that a greater game of cat and mouse is at play. The investigation leads them down a deserted path, with traps being set to distract the team from the truth. Just what do a Psychotherapist and a mental health inpatient have in common?When the DCI’s ex-wife is threatened, he takes measures to take the culprit down by any means necessary, even if it’s not strictly moral or legal. The clock is ticking for the squad and the women being targeted. A debut crime novel that will compel fans of Alex Gray and Neil Lancaster. Set in the bustling city of Aberdeen – the oil isn’t the only dark thing running through its soul.
author: Y.M. Miller
